extDesc.message: Save your websites, where no one can see them!

hintstart.message: Please, choose a password to start using Private Bookmarks.

hintlogin.message: Please insert your password to unlock.

hintuse1.message: Right click on a page to add to private bookmarks

hintuse2.message: Drag & drop the bookmarks to reorder them

open.message: Open bookmark in a new window

warningmsg.message: Please, login before trying to change any settings.

initbackuphelp.message: Copy the block of text on the left to perform a full backup of all your Private Bookmarks and store them somewhere safe. Data is encrypted using your current password and you'll need it to restore the backup.

initrestorehelp.message: Paste the block of text you got when you performed the backup to import all your data from Private Bookmarks. After that, type the associated password and click "Restore". Note: You will not lose your current bookmarks.

errorrestoremsg.message: Something went wrong while restoring your backup. Is it the same text you copied? Please try again and if the problem persists, report it to me.

successrestoremsg.message: You successfully restored all your data. Keep enjoying Private Bookmarks.

askreset.message: Are you sure you want to perform full reset?

resetwarning.message: This will delete all your information (bookmarks, password and settings). BE CAREFUL, this action is irreversible!

closetab.message: Close tab after adding to private bookmarks

supportintroduction.message: Hello! My name is João Magalhães and I'm a 22-year old portuguese web and android developer. I love building stuff for the web but I'm just a student for now. If you could help me in some way, I would be very much appreciated.

supportsuggest.message: You can even suggest your own features for Private Bookmarks :-)

reportbug.message: Report a bug or ask for help
